title: Analyze curve: x^2+4 y^2=7+3xy part - c

content.question: Find the value of <math> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>d</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mi>y</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </math> at the point P found in part (b). Does the curve have a local maximum, a local minimum, or neither at the point P? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: Find the value of <math> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>d</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mi>y</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </math> at the point P found in part (b). Does the curve have a local maximum, a local minimum, or neither at the point P? Justify your answer.

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
